attributes.action: The Brexit we face, is unrecognisable to the Brexit we want
attributes.additional_details: I am a 61 year old man who has voted Conservative his whole life. I am now disillusioned with the whole political system. if there was. general Election, who could I vote for to show my displeasure. The whole two party system the UK follows is not defunct and no longer fir for service.
attributes.background: The establishment, have done nothing since the referendum result in June 2016 but attempt to thwart the will of the country. Leave means Leave, go away from, depart from. it does not mean closer alignment to.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about Brexit, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign and share one or more of these petitions. 
 
Brexit article 50 must not be withdrawn https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/246387
  
Leave the EU Without a deal on April 12th https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/248281
 
Leave EU by April 12th 2019 with deal or no deal https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/250967 

Leave with No Deal if Parliament rejects the EU Withdrawal Agreement https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234393
 
Renegotiate the Brexit deal immediately in the event MPs vote against it https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234195
 
Support the Prime Minister's Brexit Deal https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233104

Say no to another EU Referendum aka "Peoples Vote" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241418
